Title: Chengdu - Chongqing Railway opened to traffic
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Peasant looking at a train crossing a viaduct, about to reach a celebratory gate. The Chengdu - Chongqing Railway opened to traffic on 1 July 1952, and was the first railway to be built after the founding of the People's Republic of China.
